full_summary:
# Shared Services Canada – Task-Based and Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) – Tier 2 – Solutions Integration Services

## Request for Proposal (RFP)

* **Request ID**: R000124369
* **Publication Date**: October 11, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 31, 2022 2:00 PM EDT
* **Contact**: Dana Hemmings, Email: [dana.hemmings@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:dana.hemmings@ssc-spc.gc.ca), Phone: 343-549-4735

## About the Opportunity

Shared Services Canada (SSC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Task-Based and Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) – Tier 2 – Solutions Integration Services. This procurement is set aside for Aboriginal Business under the federal government's Set-Aside Program for Aboriginal Business.

## Scope of Work

SSC intends to award one (1) contract for three (3) years, plus two (2) options years, for services in the National Capital Region (NCR) for the following categories:

* Business System Analyst Level 3 (1 resource per year)
* Platform Analyst - Level 3 (6 resources per year)
* Technology Architect Level 3 (7 resources per year)
* Technology Architect Level 2 (2 resources per year)

## Required Security Clearance

* Minimum Corporate Security Required: Facility Security Clearance (Secret)
* Minimum Resource Security Required: SECRET

## Pre-Qualified Suppliers

SSC has invited the following suppliers to submit a proposal:

* 1511995 Ontario Inc., Tundra Technical Solutions in Joint Venture
* 1511995 Ontario Limited, ipss inc., in JV
* ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp., and Randstad Interim Inc.
* Alivaktuk Consulting Inc. & NavPoint Consulting Group Inc., in JV
* Dalian Enterprises and Coradix Technology Consulting, in Joint Venture
* Donna Cona Inc., IBM CANADA LIMITED IN JOINT VENTE, and others.

## Method of Supply

Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Method of Supply is refreshed three (3) times per year.

## How to Become a Qualified Supplier

Suppliers interested in becoming a qualified supplier can contact RCNMDAI-NCRIMOS@pwgsc.gc.ca.

Note: This procurement is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and the World Trade Organization
